title: Mandarin Salad With Poppy Seed Dressing
instructions: Cut or tear lettuce into bite size pieces .
Thinly slice the red onion .
Drain liquid from mandarin_oranges and pat dry with a paper towel .
Gently toss together in a large bowl .
Wisk together all dressing ingredients until sugar is dissolved and texture is smooth .
Pour dressing ( amount to taste ) over salad and serve .
Note : Dressing can be made a day ahead and refrigerated .

title: Cranberry Salad
instructions: Add the cranberries and the sugar together in the food processor and grind well , add the orange and apple grind until well combined .
Add the coconut , marshmallows and nuts , stir to incorporate .
If you let the mixture set for a few days in the refrigerator , it gets much better .
Serve in a glass jar to show how pretty it is .

title: Parsley and Mint Salad with Chipotle Vinaigrette
instructions: Bring a small pan of lightly salted water to a boil .
Blanch the sliced garlic for about 3 minutes , and drain .
Set aside .
In a small bowl , whisk together the lemon_juice , orange_juice , salt , and pepper .
Drizzle in the olive_oil in a slow , thin stream , whisking all the time , until emulsified .
Stir in the minced chiles .
Place washed and dried greens in a bowl , add the slivered garlic and the dressing , and toss to coat evenly .
Place a mound of greens on each plate .
Note : To pickle chipotle_peppers , combine 6 peppers that have been stemmed and , if desired , seeded with 2 cups of red wine vinegar in a small non reactive saucepan .
Bring to a boil , then reduce the heat so the vinegar is simmering .
Cook , covered , for 5 minutes .
Set aside to cool , then store in a glass jar in the refrigerator for up to 3 months .

title: Ambrosia Salad
instructions: Mix all of the above well .
Refrigerate 4 to 6 hours before eating .

title: Cranberry Salad
instructions: Grind/chop cranberries and orange peel ( cut inner white portion of peel off and discard ) .
Set aside .
Boil water , add jello and stir until dissolved ; add sugar and stir until dissolved .
Add cranberry mixture and stir until evenly distributed in jello .
Cut orange slices and apples into small bite sized pieces ; add pecans .
Stir fruits and nuts into jello mixture and stir until evenly distributed .
Chill .

title: Italian Orange Salad
instructions: Toss oranges and onions in large salad bowl .
Add dressing ; mix lightly .
Spoon lettuce mixture evenly onto 4 salad plates ; top with the orange mixture .

title: Bow Tie Chicken Salad
instructions: Combine the chicken , pasta , almonds , celery , onion and salt in a large bowl and mix well .
Carefully fold in the mandarin_oranges and grapes .
Stir in enough mayonnaise to make of the desired consistency .
Store in the refrigerator , covered , until serving time .

title: Cranberry Salad VII
instructions: Dissolve gelatin in water .
Refrigerate 1/2 hour , or until it begins to gel .
Mix together orange , cranberries , apples and sugar .
In a 9x13 inch dish , mix the gelatin , fruit mixture , celery and walnuts
Chill in the refrigerator 3 to 4 hours , until firm .

title: Sunshine's Cranberry Salad
instructions: Combine gelatin and sugar in a mixing bowl .
Melt cranberry_sauce in a small saucepan over low heat .
Boil water and pour over the gelatin and sugar , stirring until dissolved .
Add the cranberry_sauce , pineapple , mandarin_oranges and nuts to gelatin and sugar mixture and stir well .
Pour in a shallow casserole dish or mold .
Refrigerate until firm .

title: Orange-Sesame Salad Dressing
instructions: Combine first 7 ingredients in a medium bowl .
Slowly drizzle oils into juice mixture , stirring constantly with a whisk .

title: Dried Plum Waldorf Salad
instructions: In medium bowl , combine mayonnaise and orange_juice .
Add apples , turkey , prunes , celery and walnuts , tossing to coat .
chill in refrigerator and then serve on lettuce , if you desire .

title: Italian Orange Salad
instructions: Toss oranges and onions in large salad bowl .
Add dressing ; mix lightly .
Spoon lettuce mixture evenly onto 4 salad plates ; top with the orange mixture .

title: Orange Salad With Olives & Mint
instructions: Soak onions in ice water for 30 minutes , drain .
Meanwhile , peel oranges as directed above , making sure as much of the white pith as possible is removed .
Slice , crosswise as thinly as possible and save any juice that accumulates from the slicing .
Lay the oranges in a spiral on a platter .
Combine the oil , lemon and orange_juice with salt , mint and any of the accumulated orange_juice .
Toss the onion slices over the oranges .
Spread the dressing over both evenly .
Then sprinkle with olives .

title: Linnea's Cranberry Salad
instructions: Dissolve gelatin in water .
Refrigerate 1/2 hour or until it begins to gel .
In a large bowl , mix together orange , cranberries , apples and sugar .
Add the gelatin , celery and walnuts .
Chill in the refrigerator 3 to 4 hours , until firm .
Transfer to a pretty serving bowl and serve chilled .

title: Sweetheart Salad ( Pink Salad )
instructions: Mix all ingredients together .
Chill .
Enjoy .

title: Knock Your Socks off Mandarin Salad
instructions: Shake dressing ingredients in tightly covered jar , refrigerate .
Cook almonds and 1 tablespoon plus 1 teaspoon sugar over low heat , stirring constantly until sugar is melted and almonds are coated .
Cool , break apart .
Store at room temperature .
Tear lettuce and romaine into bite-size pieces ( about 4 cups ) .
Place greens in a large salad bowl with cover , add celery and onion .
Cover and refrigerate .
5 minutes before serving , pour dressing into bowl , add 1 can ( 11 ounces ) mandarin orange segments , drained .
Toss until greens and oranges are well coated .
Add almonds and toss .
To serve immediately : Do not refrigerate dressing or salad .
NOTE : As above , cooked white chicken ( one pound ) can be added to make a main meal , good for a lunchen dish .

title: Pineapple Cheese Jello Salad Recipe
instructions: Mix cheese and Jello .
Then add in 4 c . boiling water .
Stir till well dissolved .
When begins to thicken add in crushed pineapple .
Chill .

title: Citrus & Toasted Pecan Salad
instructions: Mix salad_greens , oranges , bacon , onion and pecans in large bowl .
Add dressing ; toss lightly .

title: 5-Cup Ambrosia Salad
instructions: Drain the fruit well .
Mix all ingredients together , put into a pretty bowl , and top with cherries .
Keep refrigerated until ready to serve .
Note : if you make it several hours ahead of time , its best to add the marshmallows just before serving to keep them from breaking down too much .
Then top with cherries .
( Recipe courtesy of The Stuffed Cougar )

title: Beautiful Salad
instructions: Place servings of spinach onto salad plates .
Top with red onion , mandarin_oranges , cranberries , sliced_almonds and feta in that order .
Drizzle dressing over each salad .

title: Mango Chicken Salad With Dressing Recipe
instructions: In a small bowl mix juice and vinegar .
Slowly whisk in oil .
Add in remaining ingredients and toss .
Serves 4 to 6 .

title: Heavenly Fruit Salad
instructions: Mix sour_cream and mayo in large bowl .
Stir in fruit and marshmallows ; cover .
Refrigerate several hours or overnight .
Serve on lettuce-covered salad plates .
Sprinkle with coconut .

title: Mandarin Chicken Salad
instructions: Combine chicken , onion , salt , lemon and celery and refrigerate for several hours .
At serving time , toss chicken carefully with grapes , oranges , almonds and mayonnaise .

title: Arugula , Fennel and Orange Salad
instructions: Whisk minced shallots , olive_oil and lemon_juice in medium bowl to blend .
Season dressing to taste with salt and pepper .
Cut all peel and white pith from orange .
Using small sharp knife , cut between membranes to release segments .
Combine arugula , fennel and onion in large bowl .
Toss with enough dressing to coat .
Add orange segments ; toss to combine .
Season salad to taste with salt and pepper and serve .

title: Easy 5 Cup Fruit Salad Recipe
instructions: Combine ingredients .
Refrigerateand serve .

title: Mandarin Orange Salad
instructions: Dissolve the gelatin in the water .
Add the remaining ingredients and pour the mixture into an 8-cup mold .
Refrigerate until firm .

title: 5 Cup Fruit Salad
instructions: Place all ingredients in a bowl and mix thoroughly .
Place in refrigerator at least 12 hours prior to serving to allow setup .

title: Sarah's Ambrosia Fruit Salad
instructions: Mix pineapple , oranges , sour_cream , marshmallows , and coconut together in a bowl .
Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate until flavors blend , 2 hours to overnight .

title: Pineapple-Orange Fruit Salad
instructions: Mix ingredients together .
Chill and serve .

title: Fruit Salad
instructions: Mix all ingredients together .
Refrigerate .

title: Citrus Salad Dressing by Dr Andrew Weil
instructions: Whisk all the ingredients together or combine in a small jar and shake well .
Keeps in the refrigerator for 2 days .

title: Black-Bean and Yellow-Rice Salad
instructions: In a medium saucepan , heat 2 tablespoons of the oil over moderately low heat .
Add the onion & peppers ; cook , stirring occasionally , until translucent , about 7 minutes .
Stir in the garlic , turmeric , cumin , 1 teaspoon of the salt , the black_pepper , oregano and rice .
Cook , stirring frequently , for 2 minutes .
Add the water or broth and bay_leaf ; bring to a simmer .
Reduce the heat to low and cook , covered , until all the liquid is absorbed and the rice is done , about 20 minutes .
Remove the bay_leaf .
In a large glass or stainless-steel bowl , combine the rice , beans , bell pepper , and tomatoes .
Add the remaining 1 tablespoon oil and 1/4 teaspoon salt , the vinegar , and parsley .
Toss gently to combine .
Serve with lime wedges , if using .
